question: What is the main objective of the "Mee Annapurna" scheme of Maharashtra?
option1: Provide basic food to the poors
explanation: The main objective of the "Mee Annapurna" scheme of Maharashtra is the welfare of farmers. The Integrated Risk Insurance Brokers Limited(IRIBL) announced this project. IRIBL is licensed under the Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India.
